subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The American midfielder Clint Dempsey scored the decisive goal as Fulham defeat Juventus, 4-1, and overturned a three-goal aggregate deficit to reach the quarterfinals of the Europa League.
snippet: The American midfielder Clint Dempsey scored the decisive goal as Fulham defeat Juventus, 4-1, and overturned a three-goal aggregate deficit to reach the quarterfinals of the Europa League.
